movies.title: Ich für dich, du für mich

biography.bio: Maria Wancka is an actress, known for Ich für dich, du für mich (1934).
biography.name: Maria Wancka

biography.bio: Inge Kick is an actress, known for Ich für dich, du für mich (1934) and Matrimonial Strike (1935).
biography.name: Inge Kick

biography.bio: Ruth Eweler was born on March 19, 1916 in Plettenberg-Eiringhausen, Germany. She was an actress, known for Ich für dich, du für mich (1934), La fille du samurai (1937) and Männer soll man nicht alleine lassen (1938). She died on October 1, 1947 in Steglitz, Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Ruth Eweler

biography.bio: Ruth Claus is an actress, known for Ich für dich, du für mich (1934), Drei Mädels vom Rhein (1955) and Die lustigen Weiber (1936).
biography.name: Ruth Claus

biography.bio: Karl Dannemann was born on March 22, 1896 in Bremen, Germany. He was an actor, known for Le policier Schwenke (1935), Abenteuer in Marokko (1938) and Carl Peters (1941). He died in April 1945 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Karl Dannemann

biography.bio: Carl de Vogt was born on September 14, 1885 in Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany as Carl Bernhard de Vogt. He was an actor, known for Les araignées - Le lac d'or (1919), Les araignées - Le cargo d'esclaves (1920) and Der Herr der Liebe (1919). He was married to Claire Lotto. He died on February 16, 1970 in West Berlin, West Germany.
biography.name: Carl de Vogt

biography.bio: Knut Hartwig was born on September 16, 1891. He is known for his work on Ich für dich, du für mich (1934), Berliner Blockade (1968) and Marriage in the Shadows (1947). He died on February 12, 1977.
biography.name: Knut Hartwig

biography.bio: Eleonore Stadie is an actress, known for Ich für dich, du für mich (1934) and Triad (1938).
biography.name: Eleonore Stadie

biography.bio: Liselotte Wahl is an actress, known for Ich für dich, du für mich (1934) and Die törichte Jungfrau (1935).
biography.name: Liselotte Wahl

biography.bio: Heinz Rippert is an actor, known for Ich für dich, du für mich (1934), Familienparade (1936) and St. John's Fire (1939).
biography.name: Heinz Rippert

biography.bio: Paul W. Krüger is an actor, known for Les vaincus (1936), Violet of Potsdam Square (1936) and Un grand amour (1942).
biography.name: Paul W. Krüger

biography.bio: Katja Bennefeld is an actress, known for Le policier Schwenke (1935), Ich für dich, du für mich (1934) and Ein schwerer Junge (1934).
biography.name: Katja Bennefeld

biography.bio: Hugo Froelich is an actor and production manager, known for It Was a Gay Ballnight (1939), Les frères Karamazoff (1921) and Wenn wir alle Engel wären (1936).
biography.name: Hugo Froelich

biography.placeOfBirth: Memel, East Prussia, Germany [now Klaipeda, Lithuania]
biography.bio: Ernst Gronau was born on August 21, 1887 in Memel, East Prussia, Germany as Ernst Alfred Gronau. He was an actor, known for Genuine (1920), L'exil (1927) and Ich kenn' dich nicht und liebe dich (1934). He died on August 10, 1938.
biography.name: Ernst Gronau

biography.bio: Emilia Unda was born on January 29, 1879 in Riga, Russian Empire. She was an actress, known for Jeunes filles en uniforme (1931), Man by the Roadside (1923) and Adieux (1930). She died on December 7, 1939 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Emilia Unda
